Room.Name: Elven Workshop Front Door
Room.ShortDescription: You are standing outside the front door of the Elven Workshop.
Room.LongDescription: The colors all about you are sharp and vivid, a perfect place for this snow white cottage with the red trim. A good smelling smoke puffs from the chimney around the corner to the north, while to the south you see a great waterwheel connected to the house. It turns slowly as the water from a stream cascades down its paddles. A small sign on the door bids you to enter, if you are interested in purchasing elven crafted jewelry. As a sort of after thought, the sign adds, "Please do not use magic inside."
